title: 3br/2.5 bath 2 Story Vallejo Home, clean well kept-12 month lease
posting_body: Built in 1990, this open and spacious home has a nice sitting room off the kitchen with a brick fireplace, a dining room/living room and 3 bedrooms upstairs with the master bath full tub and shower combination and dual sinks.
Master bedroom has great closet space and comfortable architecture.
1,614 square feet of living space.
5,771 square foot fenced yard
Washer dryer hook ups for electric or gas dryer.
Large kitchen sink and tile counter tops.
Newly fenced back yard with shade trees and a front lawn, quiet neighborhood.
The house does not have A/C
Attached 2 car garage with side door.
Non-smoker(s) only
Available  September 20th (or sooner, but not before Sept 6th)
$3300/month - - Utilities will be the responsibility of tenant(s)
$2500 security deposit
Background check will be required; with verifiable references.
Please email with any questions or to schedule your viewing.
Thank you for your interest.
We have no additional images to post or email at this time as our tenant is in the process of moving out.
If you are interested is seeing the outside of property, please email me for the address and include your phone number.
We can also schedule an appointment to show you the home if you are interested.
We will update this ad and post some interior and exterior pictures after Sept 1 if it is not already rented.
Thank you.
